           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>

        </table>

    <mr-autocomplete vocabularyname="project" for="targetProjectInput" role="listbox" id="chops-autocomplete-1"><!---->
      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }
      </style>

          </tbody>
        </table>

      <chops-dialog closeonoutsideclick="">
        <h3 class="medium-heading">
          <span>Blocked on issues</span>
          <button aria-label="close">

          </button>

        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

      
      
        
          <slot></slot>
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      <dialog class="dialog" role="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

        <chops-timestamp title="Thu, May 20, 2021, 5:28 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1210487#c7">Comment 7<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Thu, May 20, 2021, 5:28 AM EDT"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
        
      
        The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<span class="line"><!---->The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<!----></span><br>The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<span class="line"><!---->The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) < LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<span class="line"><!---->  if ((end_time - start_time) &lt; LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  for (auto& observer : observers_) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (auto&amp; observer : observers_) {<!----></span><br>    observer->OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<span class="line"><!---->    observer-&gt;OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<!----></span><br>  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<span class="line"><!---->  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<!----></span><br>  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<!----></span><br>    Thread::Current()->RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    Thread::Current()-&gt;RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<!----></span><br><br>[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487" Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4.         The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4"><!---->e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Fri Jun 04 16:50:25 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Fri Jun 04 16:50:25 2021<!----></span><br><br>[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487" title="AddressSanitizer: use-after-poison long_task_detector.cc:46 in blink::LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask"><!---->Bug: 1210487<!----></a><br>Change-Id: Iccea748ac144def6884be8cf542cdc3572bed81a<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: Iccea748ac144def6884be8cf542cdc3572bed81a<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2909934<a href="https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2909934"><!---->https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2909934<!----></a><br>Reviewed-by: Deep Roy <<span         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit       UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/92.0.4494.0 Safari/537.36<span class="line"><!---->UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/92.0.4494.0 Safari/537.36<!----></span><br><br>Steps to reproduce the problem:<span class="line"><!---->Steps to reproduce the problem:<!----></span><br>#TestOn<span class="line"><!---->#TestOn<!----></span><br>Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64<span class="line"><!---->Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64<!----></span><br>gs://chromium-browser-asan/win32-release_x64/asan-win32-release_x64-880310.zip<span class="line"><!---->gs://chromium-browser-asan/win32-release_x64/asan-win32-release_x64-880310.zip<!----></span><br><br>#Reproduce<span class="line"><!---->#Reproduce<!----></span><br>I did not provide POC because there is no stable reproducible sample, but also because the method in the video can be reproduced without POC.<span class="line"><!---->I did not provide POC because there is no stable reproducible sample, but also because the method in the video can be reproduced without POC.<!----></span><br>See attached video<span class="line"><!---->See attached video<!----></span><br><br>What is the expected behavior?<span class="line"><!---->What is the expected behavior?<!----></span><br><br>What went wrong?<span class="line"><!---->What went wrong?<!----></span><br>#Analysis<span class="line"><!---->#Analysis<!----></span><br>third_party/blink/renderer/core/loader/long_task_detector.cc<span class="line"><!---->third_party/blink/renderer/core/loader/long_task_detector.cc<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) <         The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<span class="line"><!---->The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<!----></span><br>The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<span class="line"><!---->The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) < LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<span class="line"><!---->  if ((end_time - start_time) &lt; LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  for (auto& observer : observers_) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (auto&amp; observer : observers_) {<!----></span><br>    observer->OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<span class="line"><!---->    observer-&gt;OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<!----></span><br>  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<span class="line"><!---->  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<!----></span><br>  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<!----></span><br>    Thread::Current()->RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    Thread::Current()-&gt;RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<!----></span><br><br>[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487"         This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

      UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/92.0.4494.0 Safari/537.36<span class="line"><!---->UserAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/92.0.4494.0 Safari/537.36<!----></span><br><br>Steps to reproduce the problem:<span class="line"><!---->Steps to reproduce the problem:<!----></span><br>#TestOn<span class="line"><!---->#TestOn<!----></span><br>Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64<span class="line"><!---->Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64<!----></span><br>gs://chromium-browser-asan/win32-release_x64/asan-win32-release_x64-880310.zip<span class="line"><!---->gs://chromium-browser-asan/win32-release_x64/asan-win32-release_x64-880310.zip<!----></span><br><br>#Reproduce<span class="line"><!---->#Reproduce<!----></span><br>I did not provide POC because there is no stable reproducible sample, but also because the method in the video can be reproduced without POC.<span class="line"><!---->I did not provide POC because there is no stable reproducible sample, but also because the method in the video can be reproduced without POC.<!----></span><br>See attached video<span class="line"><!---->See attached video<!----></span><br><br>What is the expected behavior?<span class="line"><!---->What is the expected behavior?<!----></span><br><br>What went wrong?<span class="line"><!---->What went         The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<span class="line"><!---->The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<!----></span><br>The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<span class="line"><!---->The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) < LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<span class="line"><!---->  if ((end_time - start_time) &lt; LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  for (auto& observer : observers_) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (auto&amp; observer : observers_) {<!----></span><br>    observer->OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<span class="line"><!---->    observer-&gt;OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<!----></span><br>  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<span class="line"><!---->  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<!----></span><br>  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<!----></span><br>    Thread::Current()->RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    Thread::Current()-&gt;RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<!----></span><br><br>[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487"         This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit         </div>
        
      </div>
    
      
        
      
        
          Labels:<strong><!---->Labels:</strong>

        *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

start_time,<span class="line"><!---->@@ -33,7 +33,10 @@ void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                       base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                       base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>   if ((end_time - start_time) < LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<span class="line"><!---->   if ((end_time - start_time) &lt; LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<!----></span><br>     return;<span class="line"><!---->     return;<!----></span><br>-  for (auto& observer : observers_) {<span class="line"><!---->-  for (auto&amp; observer : observers_) {<!----></span><br>+<span class="line"><!---->+<!----></span><br>+  HeapHashSet<Member<LongTaskObserver>> observers;<span class="line"><!---->+  HeapHashSet&lt;Member&lt;LongTaskObserver&gt;&gt; observers;<!----></span><br>+  observers.swap(observers);<span class="line"><!---->+  observers.swap(observers);<!----></span><br>+  for (auto& observer : observers) {<span class="line"><!---->+  for (auto&amp; observer : observers) {<!----></span><br>     observer->OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);<span class="line"><!---->     observer-&gt;OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);<!----></span><br>   }<span class="line"><!---->   }<!----></span><br> }<span class="line"><!----> }<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br><br>Did this work before? N/A <span class="line"><!---->Did this work before? N/A <!----></span><br><br>Chrome version: 92.0.4494.0  Channel: dev<span class="line"><!---->Chrome version: 92.0.4494.0  Channel: dev<!----></span><br>OS Version: 10.0<span class="line"><!---->OS Version: 10.0<!----></span><br>Flash Version: <span class="line"><!---->Flash Version: <!----></span><br><br>fuzz22.debug.webm is test on debug version<span class="line"><!---->fuzz22.debug.webm is test on debug version<!----></span><br>fuzz22.release.asan.webm test on gs://chromium-browser-asan/win32-release_x64/asan-win32-release_x64-880310.zip<span class="line"><!---->fuzz22.release.asan.webm test on gs://chromium-browser-asan/win32-release_x64/asan-win32-release_x64-880310.zip<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<span class="line"><!---->The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<!----></span><br>The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<span class="line"><!---->The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) < LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<span class="line"><!---->  if ((end_time - start_time) &lt; LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  for (auto& observer : observers_) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (auto&amp; observer : observers_) {<!----></span><br>    observer->OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<span class="line"><!---->    observer-&gt;OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<!----></span><br>  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<span class="line"><!---->  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<!----></span><br>  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<!----></span><br>    Thread::Current()->RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    Thread::Current()-&gt;RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<!----></span><br><br>[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487" Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4.         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/b7a1f498f17ef4a617ff7c1133c4b1d8785f9434<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/b7a1f498f17ef4a617ff7c1133c4b1d8785f9434"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/b7a1f498f17ef4a617ff7c1133c4b1d8785f9434<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>b7a1f498f17ef4a617ff7c1133c4b1d8785f9434<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/b7a1f498f17ef4a617ff7c1133c4b1d8785f9434"><!---->b7a1f498f17ef4a617ff7c1133c4b1d8785f9434<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Fri Jun 11 08:05:05 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Fri Jun 11 08:05:05 2021<!----></span><br><br>[M90-LTS][LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[M90-LTS][LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit <!----></span>e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4"><!---->e88c656a9fb4a7bb1c66ddcedae8049a448ebef4<!----></a>)<span class="line"><!---->)<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487" title="AddressSanitizer: use-after-poison long_task_detector.cc:46 in blink::LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask"><!---->Bug: 1210487<!----></a><br>Change-Id: Iccea748ac144def6884be8cf542cdc3572bed81a<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: Iccea748ac144def6884be8cf542cdc3572bed81a<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2909934<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2909934"><!---->https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/2909934<!----></a><br>Reviewed-by: Deep Roy <<span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-by: Deep Roy &lt;<!----></span>dproy@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/dproy@chromium.org"><!---->dproy@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Reviewed-by: Nicolás Peña Moreno <<span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-by: Nicolás Peña Moreno &lt;<!----></span>npm@chromium.org<a class="undefined"       base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) <         The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<span class="line"><!---->The stack trace shows the execution path from DidProcessTask[1] to UnregisterObserver[2], which is the root cause of the vulnerability.<!----></span><br>The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<span class="line"><!---->The ASAN log can only see the access violation at DidProcessTask[1] due to the invalidation of the iterator, and it is impossible to see why the iterator is invalid.<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><br>void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask(base::TimeTicks start_time,<!----></span><br>                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<span class="line"><!---->                                      base::TimeTicks end_time) {<!----></span><br>  if ((end_time - start_time) < LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<span class="line"><!---->  if ((end_time - start_time) &lt; LongTaskDetector::kLongTaskThreshold)<!----></span><br>    return;<span class="line"><!---->    return;<!----></span><br><br>  for (auto& observer : observers_) {<span class="line"><!---->  for (auto&amp; observer : observers_) {<!----></span><br>    observer->OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<span class="line"><!---->    observer-&gt;OnLongTaskDetected(start_time, end_time);		//[1]<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br><br>void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<span class="line"><!---->void LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver(LongTaskObserver* observer) {<!----></span><br>  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<span class="line"><!---->  DCHECK(IsMainThread());<!----></span><br>  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<span class="line"><!---->  observers_.erase(observer);		//[2]<!----></span><br>  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<span class="line"><!---->  if (observers_.size() == 0) {<!----></span><br>    Thread::Current()->RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<span class="line"><!---->    Thread::Current()-&gt;RemoveTaskTimeObserver(this);<!----></span><br>  }<span class="line"><!---->  }<!----></span><br>}<span class="line"><!---->}<!----></span><br>```<span class="line"><!---->```<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75"><!---->702f4d4ddb963cafb0d133972282dfc803510b75<!----></a><br>Author: Yutaka Hirano <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Yutaka Hirano &lt;<!----></span>yhirano@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/yhirano@chromium.org"><!---->yhirano@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<span class="line"><!---->Date: Thu May 20 15:21:39 2021<!----></span><br><br>[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<span class="line"><!---->[LongTaskDetector] Remove container mutation during iteration<!----></span><br><br>On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<span class="line"><!---->On LongTaskDetector, we call OnLongTaskDetected for all registered<!----></span><br>observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>Bug: 1210487<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1210487" title="AddressSanitizer: use-after-poison long_task_detector.cc:46 in blink::LongTaskDetector::DidProcessTask"><!---->Bug: 1210487<!----></a><br>Change-Id:         This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<span class="line"><!---->observers. Some observers call LongTaskDetector::UnregisterObserver<!----></span><br>in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<span class="line"><!---->in the callback, which is problematic because container mutation is<!----></span><br>not allowed during iteration.<span class="line"><!---->not allowed during iteration.<!----></span><br><br>Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<span class="line"><!---->Copy the observer set to avoid the violation.<!----></span><br><br>(cherry picked from commit <span class="line"><!---->(cherry picked from commit         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<!----></span><br><br>Please contact <span class="line"><!---->Please contact <!----></span>security-vrp@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="mailto:security-vrp@chromium.org"><!---->security-vrp@chromium.org<!----></a> with any questions.<span class="line"><!----> with any questions.<!----></span><br>******************************<span class="line"><!---->******************************<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
        <div>
          
        </div>
      <div class="comment-body">
        <mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        <div>
          
        </div>
      </div>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

      <style>
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

 crdx('setFeedbackButtonLink', 'https://bugs.chromium.org/p/monorail/issues/entry?template=Online%20Feedback');
});
</script>

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
